text: Alphonsa of the Immaculate Conception FCC (born Anna Muttathupadathu; 19 August 1910 â€“ 28 July 1946), also known as Saint Alphonsa, was an Indian nun and teacher. She was beatified on 8 February 1986, and canonized on 12 October 2008 in the Vatican City.
